title: Sebastian Lester
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Sebastian Lester**

British designer, trained at Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design, London. Early type designs released with [T.26](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/T.26) and [GarageFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/GarageFonts). Currently designing custom and retail type at [Monotype Imaging Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype%20Imaging%20Inc.), notably sans families: [Scene](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Scene), [Neo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023312/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neo) Sans, and Neo Tech.

**External Links**

author: Stephen Coles
